name: Squicoon Land II: The Recovery
description:
In a distant future after humans have left the earth ravaged by toxic sludge, raccoons have evolved and are cleaning up the waste so they can revive the planet’s ecosystem.

Trade refined sludge with the capitalistic, seed-hoarding squid to give your burgeoning raccoon team the resources to plant sustainable crops, transforming the landscape from a toxic waste dump to a permaculture paradise.

No gods, no kings, only raccoons.

Playable in your browser here (click full screen button in lower right to view full game screen)

Made for the 2019 Philly Game Jam based on the theme "Recovery".

Credits:

Adrian Carnes
